typeDescription.name: cmu.lti.hw1_shenwu.TestElement
typeDescription.description: to decide wether a sentence is a Question or an Answer

typeDescription.name: cmu.lti.hw1_shenwu.Question
typeDescription.description: annotation of questions, specifically with the given input, the questions are the sentences started with 'Q'. and we assume in each input file, there is only one question.

typeDescription.name: cmu.lti.hw1_shenwu.Answer
typeDescription.description: annotation of answers, specifically with the given input, the answers are the sentences started with 'A'.

typeDescription.name: cmu.lti.hw1_shenwu.TokenUniGram
typeDescription.description: This type will be the annotation of all 1-Grams .i.e, tokens

typeDescription.name: cmu.lti.hw1_shenwu.TokenBiGram
typeDescription.description: This type will be the annotation of all 2-Grams

typeDescription.name: cmu.lti.hw1_shenwu.TokenTriGram
typeDescription.description: This type will be the annotation of all 3-Grams

typeDescription.name: cmu.lti.hw1_shenwu.basicAnnotationType
typeDescription.description: basic type, in cludes string feature source, and numeric feature confidence. All other typies we use in this project all will be inherited from this type

typeDescription.name: cmu.lti.hw1_shenwu.Score
typeDescription.description: given score to each answer based on it's NGram

typeDescription.name: cmu.lti.hw1_shenwu.Evaluator
typeDescription.description: The system will sort the answers according to their scores, and calculate precision at N (where N is the total number of correct answers).
